snippet.title: Singled Out - now available on PC!
snippet.description:
Now available for Nintendo Switch too! https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/singled-out-switch/
10 million weirdos. 1 galactic supercriminal. Don't shoot the wrong one.
⭐ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1144150/Singled_Out/
⭐ ITCH.IO: https://crowbarska.itch.io/singled-out

🌍 WEBSITE: https://www.mattglanville.com/singledout
📰 PRESSKIT: https://www.mattglanville.com/singled-out-presskit


📧 MAILING LIST: http://eepurl.com/gv2FRT
⭐ PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/mattglanville

🐦 TWITTER: https://twitter.com/crowbarska
👍 FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/crowbarska/
📷 INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/crowbarska/
